RR_verdict: The Altra Provision 8 continues to impress as a stability trainer that Altra has slightly refined, maintaining its broad appeal despite a slight increase in weight. From our tests, it provides steady, durable performance, though it might not excite those looking for innovation. This version maintains a true zero-drop design, contributing to a natural running posture, and its flexible design ensures it serves well as a sturdy all-rounder, perfect for everyday miles and daily life.
awards: Top pick in best Altra running shoes
